room_title: Escape room "Wicked Workshop" by Unravel Escape Rooms in New York
room_description:
This is not child’s play, as you sign up for a tour at William Daed’s handmade toy workshop. You have a rare opportunity to visit and peek behind the door. However, your enthusiasm quickly begins to fall apart.
As there appears to be something amiss, William Daed is nowhere to found and you have been locked in his workshop with the fragments and skeletons of unfinished dolls and puppets. Within the intimate workshop the walls begin to feel as they are closing in on you. Discover the dark secret of the workshop and uncover the truth about the owner!
